name: comment-system-ui
description: Admin dashboard and SDK for Vrooli Comment System

scripts.build: npm run build-sdk && npm run build-dashboard
scripts.build-sdk: node -e "console.log('SDK already prebuilt; skipping rollup bundle')"
scripts.build-dashboard: bash -c 'rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/vendor && cp -R src/* dist/ && cp -R sdk dist/ && cp node_modules/@vrooli/iframe-bridge/dist/iframeBridgeChild.js dist/vendor/iframeBridgeChild.js'

author: Vrooli AI
